channel.title: Thebigm on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Thebigm on Laura Kalbag

item.title: Who wants a ticket for The Big M?
item.description: I don’t know if you know, but I made the website for the upcoming super exciting mobile conference, The Big M. The Big M website As a result, I have 3 conference tickets worth £233.83 to give away to lovely people who want to learn more about mobile (covering topics such as innovation, usability, development, apps and mobile web.) My 3 tickets are for the first day, the conference part of The Big M, which is on 21st March 2011 at Komedia in Bath (UK.
